channel.title: CelestialX Project, Looking for Team members
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]Celestial X, A new project! We are looking for excited people to create a team of Developers,Designers,Managers. We are heading to be a succesfull running server including community.[/SIZE] [B][U] About CelestialX.[/U][/B] Project Insanity Based. 317 Loading Higher ItemDB/Mapdata etc.
Paid Webserver located @ Miami, 24/7 Ofcourse, Unlimited Data/Data transfer. Space for 50 SQL Databases.
Gameserver located @ Netherland, [B]Current Low Basic [/B] 2,8Ghz Duocore, 8GB RAM, Windows Server 2012 Datacenter. Remote Control Acces.
[B]Next Upgrade.[/B] 3,6GhZ I7 8 Core, 16GB Ram, Fiber Net Prefered Linux Based.
Website / Forum are basicly build. Website currently under construction. [url=http://celestialx.com]http://celestialx.com[/url] [url=http://forum.celestialx.com]http://forum.celestialx.com[/url]
[B][U]When everything goes as planned:[/U][/B] The first couple of months the money gained on Advertisement / Donations will be used for "See Below" Java application Certificate SSL Certificate IPboard Certificate
After all this has been achieved money gained will go spread under the team for the work done. And this will be a serious job.
[B][U]Currently looking for:[/U][/B] Sever Developer Client Developer Forum/Website/Community Manager Graphical Artist Web Designer
[B][U]Requirements,[/U][/B] Fluid English communication skills. Effort for this project. Knowledge in the role you are applying for. Independent worker.
[B][U]Application:[/U][/B]
[QUOTE] Name: Age: Time zone: Role(s): Additional information: Contact method:[/QUOTE]

item.title: CelestialX Project, Looking for Team members
item.dc:creator: @Mister_Master Mister Master
item.description:
@Mister_Master wrote:

[quote=“vincentvodb, post:5, topic:542110”]Name: Vincent
Age:21
Time zone: +1 Brussels
Role(s): Web dev. or Server Coding
Additional information:
Coding Experience:

[ul][li]Java[/li]
[li]C#[/li]
[li]PHP[/li]
[li]CSS[/li]
[li]HTML[/li]
[li]VB.net[/li][/ul]

Contact method: Pm here then il give you more information[/quote]

I have PM’d you and added you on Skype, hope to hear from you soon!

Read full topic

item.description:
@woodchopchop wrote:

Name:Dylan
Age:17
Time zone: 0 gmt
Additional information:I have done quite alot of work on this source i been away from rsps coding for a wile now and wanting to get back into it i can put in about 4 hours a day towards to project dependent on studies i can code for server and client but no way in hell i will be modeling i have done a little web site work but realistically don’t expect me to be any help in the area, thanks
Contact method: skype

Name:Josh Cougan
Age:16
Time zone: Western Mountain Time (Not sure if that’s right but I live in Canada in the province of Alberta)
Role:Server developer
Additional Information:Nothing really just I’ve been coding for a while and was looking for a project to start and would like to join this one. I love to play futbol and skateboard.
Contact Method:Skype. Josh.cougan

[SIZE=4]Celestial X, A new project!
We are looking for excited people to create a team of Developers,Designers,Managers.
We are heading to be a succesfull running server including community.[/SIZE]
[B][U]
About CelestialX.[/U][/B]
Project Insanity Based.
317 Loading Higher ItemDB/Mapdata etc.

Paid Webserver located @ Miami,
24/7 Ofcourse,
Unlimited Data/Data transfer.
Space for 50 SQL Databases.

Gameserver located @ Netherland,
[B]Current Low Basic [/B]
2,8Ghz Duocore,
8GB RAM,
Windows Server 2012 Datacenter.
Remote Control Acces.

[B]Next Upgrade.[/B]
3,6GhZ I7 8 Core,
16GB Ram,
Fiber Net
Prefered Linux Based.

Website / Forum are basicly build.
Website currently under construction.
http://celestialx.com
http://forum.celestialx.com

[B][U]When everything goes as planned:[/U][/B]
The first couple of months the money gained on Advertisement / Donations will be used for "See Below"
Java application Certificate
SSL Certificate
IPboard Certificate

After all this has been achieved money gained will go spread under the team for the work done.
And this will be a serious job.

[B][U]Currently looking for:[/U][/B]
Sever Developer
Client Developer
Forum/Website/Community Manager
